description:
Girl Of Now EDP - A Captivating Floral Oriental Fragrance

Experience the enchanting allure of Elie Saab Girl Of Now, a mesmerizing oriental fragrance that captures the essence of modern femininity. This exquisite 90ml Eau de Parfum embodies the spirit of a confident woman who embraces her uniqueness and lives in the moment. âœ¨

The Magical Composition of Girl Of Now

Created by master perfumers Sophie LabbÃ© and Dominique Ropion, this captivating scent introduces an innovative pistachio-almond accord that makes it truly distinctive in the world of luxury fragrances. The signature orange blossom from Elie Saab's original fragrance line is reinvented with a modern twist, creating a scent that's both familiar and excitingly new. ðŸŒ¸

Product Information
Size 90ml
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration EDP
Brand Elie Saab

Fragrance Profile of Girl Of Now EDP

Fragrance Notes Composition
Top Notes Pear, Mandarin Orange, Pistachio
Heart Notes Orange Blossom, Almond, Magnolia
Base Notes Patchouli, Cashmeran, Almond Milk, Tonka Bean

Key Features of Girl Of Now

  • Unique pistachio-almond accord that creates a gourmand signature ðŸŒ¿
  • Long-lasting formulation with impressive sillage and projection ðŸ’«
  • Elegant bottle design featuring the iconic flower-shaped cap ðŸ’Ž
  • Perfect for best-selling evening wear and special occasions
  • Moderate to heavy intensity that lasts throughout the day
  • A new arrival that has quickly become a modern classic

The Legacy Behind Girl Of Now

Launched in 2017, Girl Of Now represents the evolution of Elie Saab's fragrance journey. The renowned Lebanese fashion designer, known for his exquisite couture creations, translated his vision of modern femininity into this captivating fragrance. The scent embodies the Elie Saab ethos of timeless elegance with a contemporary edge. ðŸ”¥

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Girl Of Now EDP last on skin?

The Girl Of Now Eau de Parfum offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. Its pistachio and almond notes create a rich, creamy base that adheres beautifully to the skin, while the patchouli and cashmeran in the base notes ensure the fragrance maintains its character throughout the day. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin. âœ¨
short_description: Experience the enchanting Girl Of Now EDP by Elie Saab, where pistachio and orange blossom create a captivating floral-oriental signature. This 90ml fragrance blends gourmand sweetness with sophisticated florals for a modern, feminine scent that's irresistibly addictive.

meta_description: Discover Elie Saab Girl Of Now EDP 90ml, a captivating oriental fragrance with pistachio, orange blossom, and almond notes. Shop this addictive scent today!
